title: How to remove the wired headphones device linked with Google assistant
content: Few days before the Google assistant send a notification to me that is grand a access of wired headphones device to Google assistant.I also give access of that device with Google assistant .no notification sounds are hearing by me while using wired headset in my phone.but when I  not use  a wired headset . notification sounds are hearing by me.I had tired to remove the access of wired headphones device from Google assistant . When I totally deactivated the Google assistant .No notification sounds are hearing by me while using wired headset in my phone.please help me . please reply me immediately and also tell me how to remove the wired headphones device linked with Google assistant.
